subtitle:
1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:04,500
A-hiaⁿ, lí ē kiaⁿ--bē?

2
00:00:08,000 --> 00:00:16,500
Āu-pái. M̄-koán tú-tio̍h sáⁿ-mi̍h tāi-chì,
it-tēng ài ióng-kám.
Lán sáⁿ-mi̍h to̍h bô, kan-na ū ióng-kám.

3
00:00:20,000 --> 00:00:25,500
Lí iū-koh ji̍p-lâi góa ê bāng

4
00:00:26,000 --> 00:00:34,500
Bē-kì-tit hun-pia̍t tī tó chi̍t kang

5
00:00:35,000 --> 00:00:40,500
Lí ê ba̍k-kho͘ âng-âng

6
00:00:41,000 --> 00:00:48,500
Chhin-chhiūⁿ chin chōe ōe siūⁿ-beh káng

7
00:00:49,000 --> 00:00:56,500
Kâng-khoán ê bāng, kâng-khoán ê lâng

8
00:00:57,000 --> 00:01:03,500
Kòe-khì ê iok-sok bô-chhái-kang

9
00:01:04,000 --> 00:01:10,500
Kâng-khoán ê lâng, bô-kâng ê bāng

10
00:01:11,000 --> 00:01:18,500
Thǹg-kòe ê chhiⁿ-chhài lóng bē phang

11
00:01:36,000 --> 00:01:42,500
Hong iū-koh khin-khin teh chhoe

12
00:01:43,000 --> 00:01:50,500
Siūⁿ-beh kap lí tàu-tīn poe

13
00:01:51,000 --> 00:01:57,500
Hō͘ iū-koh mî-mî-á lo̍h

14
00:01:58,000 --> 00:02:04,500
Ba̍k-chiu ak kah tâm-kô-kô

15
00:02:05,000 --> 00:02:11,500
Bū bâng-bâng, sim khang-khang

16
00:02:12,000 --> 00:02:19,500
Chhin-chhiūⁿ tê-kó͘ phòa chi̍t khang

17
00:02:20,000 --> 00:02:27,500
Hong teh chhoe, hō͘ teh poe

18
00:02:28,000 --> 00:02:35,500
Giú bōe tiâu ê hong-chhoe

19
00:02:39,000 --> 00:02:45,500
Góa ê hong-kéng ū lí ê hûn

20
00:02:46,000 --> 00:02:53,500
Chài góa khòaⁿ chi̍t-sì-kè

21
00:02:54,000 --> 00:03:00,500
Lí ê hong-kéng ū góa chi̍t ê

22
00:03:01,000 --> 00:03:07,500
Lán éng-oán ài chò-hóe

23
00:03:08,000 --> 00:03:14,500
Chài-hōe--lah, chài-hōe--pah

24
00:03:15,000 --> 00:03:22,500
Ū-êng chiah koh lâi sio-chhē

25
00:03:23,000 --> 00:03:30,500
Siò-siò lí, siò-siò góa

26
00:03:31,000 --> 00:03:38,500
Ji̍t-thâu chiām kng, bū tng-teh sòaⁿ
